Articles.Content:
I decided to start this new tread devoted entirely to Space Stations. I have a couple of Space Stations, so here they are.

file:///Users/r2j1230/Pictures/Kerbin%20Space%20Station.png

file:///Users/r2j1230/Pictures/International%20Space%20Station.png

Just click copy and paste the link into your search bar, and you will get the pictures. If you know how to post them directly, please let me know. Thanks!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T19:47:08Z" title="04/18/2015 07:47  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by MacGamer04**

1: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/22251-Showcase-SPACE-STATIONS!-Post-your-pictures-here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/22251-Showcase-SPACE-STATIONS!-Post-your-pictures-here)

2: linking images from your hard drive won't work. It does work on YOUR pc but that's because you have access to it. I do not. You will need to upload them to the web somewhere. Many people use imgur.com

We do indeed already have [a thread for stations](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/22251-Showcase-SPACE-STATIONS%21-Post-your-pictures-here). And Imgur.com is an easy-to-use and free picture hosting site. Upload your pics there, then copy-paste the BBCode they provide into your forum posts.
